about.tagline: Inclusive and visible, but not without style
about.paragraph1: Why should an accessible website be boring? People with visual impairments or other disabilities deserve to enjoy a beautiful, intuitive, and pleasant web experience too.
about.paragraph2: Yet many sites neglect these aspects: autoplay sliders you can't stop, poorly chosen colors, buttons that can't be found… What if we did better?
about.paragraph3: For me, accessibility and design are not opposites—they complement each other. A website can be beautiful, well-ranked, and most importantly, made for everyone.
about.paragraph4: This inclusive and creative vision of the web is what drives me, and what I aim to bring to every one of my projects.

profile.title: Who am I?
profile.subtitle: Observe, understand, create: my vision of the web.
profile.tagline: A rich, atypical, and authentic journey
profile.p1: I've never had a straightforward path. I've explored different worlds: first as a photographer and actress, then as a restaurant manager. At every stage, human connection has always been at the heart of it all.
profile.p2: These experiences have brought out my listening skills, observation, and empathy — qualities I now apply to web development and online community management. What I love is creating beautiful and accessible interfaces and designing content that speaks to people and raises awareness.
profile.p3a: It was by volunteering for the association
profile.p3b: that I discovered community management. I started by welcoming traumatized cats to help them regain trust, then I was entrusted with managing the association's social networks (
profile.p3c: ). I loved creating visuals, writing optimized texts, and especially seeing the impact of my posts. That’s when I knew I wanted to pursue this career!
profile.p4a: Now certified with a Level 5 (Bac+2) Professional Title in "Web & Mobile Web Developer" and an
profile.p4b: , I’m continuing down this path by studying for a
profile.p4c: . My goal? To develop inclusive and impactful digital strategies while staying true to my values of authenticity and sharing.
profile.p5: My attentive mindset pushes me to imagine inclusive solutions, while my creativity brings fluid and engaging interfaces to life. For me, the web is a space where technology and sensitivity meet.
profile.p6: I am therefore looking for a work-study position to continue learning and growing in this field!
